revised_title: Geometry of Bifurcations in the Normalized Reduced Henon-Heiles Family
tldr: This article explores the global geometry of bifurcations in a family of Hamiltonian functions derived from the Henon-Heiles system, which is used to model axisymmetric galaxies. The author analyzes the critical points and their indexes, providing insights into the behavior of the system and its bifurcation diagram.
